items.summary: Ensure the Google AdSense script with client ID `ca-pub-5965886176480370` is present in the document <head> for the CurrencyPal website (i.e., loaded on the initial page load and therefore applicable to all SPA routes/pages), matching the user-provided snippet, and without creating duplicate script tags.

Set the frontend configuration so that `VITE_ADSENSE_CLIENT_ID` is configured to `ca-pub-5965886176480370` by default for developers (update `frontend/.env.example` accordingly), while keeping AdSense loading logic compatible with the existing environment-variable-based setup.
